albedo of snow -> if elev_bins = 1 then albedo will be determined from measurements

saturation vapour pressure at steam point temperature (hPa)

extinction coefficient of shortwave radiation in ice (m^-1) (no penetration if set to 1e10)
extinction coefficient of shortwave radiation in snow (m^-1) (no penetration if set to 1e10)
gravitational constant (at sea level). 80 N -> 9.83, 60 N -> 9.82

Von Karman constant (0.35-0.42)
latent heat of sublimation (J/kg)

latent heat of vaporization (J/kg)
gas constant of dry air
gas constant of water vapour
density of ice (kg/m3)
density of snow (kg/m3)
density of water at the melting point (kg/m3)
Stefan-Boltzmann's constant
Near-surface temperature below which precipitation is solid (C)
melting point temperature (K)
steam point temperature (K)
surface roughness length for ice (m) as in Lefebvre et al. 2003
surface roughness length for snow (m) as in Lefebvre et al. 2003
surface roughness length for snow (m) as in Lefebvre et al. 2003
flux profile correction constants (Holtslag & De Bruin '88)
specific heat of dry air (J/kg/K)
specific heat of water at 0 C (J/kg/K) (Source www.engineeringtoolbox.com)
